verses.verse: Now this is the commandment, <S%H4687><s%> the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and the ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to teach <S%H3925><s%> you, <S%H6213><s%> that you might do them in the land <S%H776><s%> where you go <S%H5674><s%> over to possess it; <S%H3423><s%>

that you might fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> all his statutes <S%H2708><s%> and his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you, <S%H1121><s%> you, and your son, and your son <S%H1121><s%>'s son, <S%H1121><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life; <S%H2416><s%> and that your days <S%H3117><s%> may be prolonged. <S%H748><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> therefore, <S%H3478><s%> Israel, and observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it; <S%H3190><s%> that it may be well with you, <S%H7235><s%> and that you may increase mightily, <S%H3966><s%> as Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> has promised <S%H1696><s%> to you, <S%H776><s%> in a land flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is our God; <S%H430><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is one: <S%H259><s%>
and you shall love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul, <S%H5315><s%> and with all your might. <S%H3966><s%>
These words, <S%H1697><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> shall be on your heart; <S%H3824><s%>

and you shall teach them diligently <S%H8150><s%> to your children, <S%H1121><s%> and shall talk <S%H1696><s%> of them when you sit <S%H3427><s%> in your house, <S%H1004><s%> and when you walk <S%H3212><s%> by the way, <S%H1870><s%> and when you lie down, <S%H7901><s%> and when you rise up. <S%H6965><s%>
You shall bind <S%H7194><s%> them for a sign <S%H226><s%> on your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and they shall be for symbols <S%H2903><s%> between your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
You shall write <S%H3789><s%> them on the door posts <S%H4201><s%> of your house, <S%H1004><s%> and on your gates. <S%H8179><s%>

It shall be, <S%H3068><s%> when Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H1419><s%> great and goodly <S%H2896><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> which you didn't <S%H1129><s%> build,

and houses <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of all good <S%H2898><s%> things, <S%H4390><s%> which you didn't fill, and cisterns <S%H953><s%> dug <S%H2672><s%> out, <S%H2672><s%> which you didn't dig, vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and olive trees, <S%H2132><s%> which you didn't <S%H5193><s%> plant, and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be full; <S%H7646><s%>

then beware <S%H8104><s%> lest you forget <S%H7911><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage. <S%H5650><s%>
You shall fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> and you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him, <S%H7650><s%> and shall swear by his name. <S%H8034><s%>
You shall not go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> of the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who are around you; <S%H5439><s%>

for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you is a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God; <S%H410><s%> lest the anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, <S%H8045><s%> and he destroy you from off the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>
You shall not tempt <S%H5254><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> as you tempted <S%H5254><s%> him in Massah. <S%H4532><s%>

You shall diligently <S%H8104><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and his testimonies, <S%H5713><s%> and his statutes, <S%H2706><s%> which he has commanded you. <S%H6680><s%>

You shall do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> that it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with you, <S%H935><s%> and that you may go in and possess <S%H3423><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%>
to thrust out <S%H1920><s%> all your enemies <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

When your son <S%H1121><s%> asks <S%H7592><s%> you in time to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "What do the testimonies, <S%H5713><s%> the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and the ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> has commanded you mean? <S%H6680><s%>"

then you shall tell <S%H559><s%> your son, <S%H1121><s%> "We were Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s bondservants <S%H5650><s%> in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> brought us out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand; <S%H3027><s%>

and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H5414><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and awesome <S%H7451><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> on Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> on Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and on all his house, <S%H1004><s%> before our eyes; <S%H5869><s%>
and he brought us out <S%H3318><s%> from there, <S%H935><s%> that he might bring us in, to give <S%H5414><s%> us the land <S%H776><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> to our fathers. <S%H1><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us to do <S%H6213><s%> all these statutes, <S%H2706><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> for our good <S%H2896><s%> always, <S%H3117><s%> that he might preserve us alive, <S%H2421><s%> as at this day. <S%H3117><s%>

It shall be righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to us, <S%H8104><s%> if we observe to do <S%H6213><s%> all this <S%H2063><s%> commandment <S%H4687><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> as he has commanded us. <S%H6680><s%>"
